content: Michael M. Adler, of Florida, to be Ambassador Extraordinary and Plenipotentiary of the United States of America to the Kingdom of Belgium.
John R. Bass, of New York, a Career Member of the Senior Foreign Service, Class of Career Minister, to be an Under Secretary of State (Management), vice Brian J. Bulatao.
Scott A. Nathan, of Massachusetts, to be Chief Executive Officer of the United States International Development Finance Corporation, vice Adam Seth Boehler.
